name: Multi Part Monographs Query
query: SELECT instances.instance_hrid AS local_id, identifiers.identifier AS oclc, CASE WHEN instances.discovery_suppress = 't' THEN 'WD' ELSE 'CH' END AS status, CONCAT(ihi.enumeration, ' ', ihi.chronology) AS enum_chron FROM folio_derived.items_holdings_instances ihi, folio_derived.instance_ext instances, folio_derived.instance_formats formats, folio_derived.instance_identifiers  identifiers WHERE instances.instance_id = ihi.instance_id AND instances.instance_id = formats.instance_id AND identifiers.instance_id = instances.instance_id AND mode_of_issuance_name IN('single unit', 'multipart monograph') AND instances.type_name = 'text' AND formats.instance_format_name = 'unmediated -- volume' AND identifiers.identifier_type_name = 'OCLC' AND ihi.holdings_id IN (SELECT sq_ihi.holdings_id FROM folio_derived.items_holdings_instances sq_ihi GROUP BY sq_ihi.holdings_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1)
